caption.title:
Marginal probability distribution of posterior mode Q
I .
caption.p:
Marginal posterior distributions with 1000 samples from Q
I are shown. Gaussian kernel density estimates are plotted in the upper triangular, marginal probability distributions are plotted on the diagonal, and the samples are shown in the lower triangular. Strong ( ρ < −0.25 and ρ > 0.25) and statistically significant ( p ≪ 0.001) correlations were indicated with red and blue frames for negative and postitive correlations, respectively.
